Meet our clients

Our members have worked with the BBC, Mozilla, Greenpeace, Moodle, Creative Commons and tens of other household names. As a co-op, our clients benefit from the multitude of skills and expertise our members possess.

Creative Commons

The Think-a-thon

In the early days of the Creative Commons Certificate program, we met with the team to run a think-a-thon.

  • Micro-credentialing expertise
  • Identity expertise
  • Community management expertise
  • Strategic advice
  • Artwork

    We Are Open Co-op

    We found each other working openly. Our co-operative is designed to help others reap the benefits of open learning, open innovation and open communities.
